Articles.Content:
How do I use it? I cant find a key binding in the game settings section and the release notes dont tell me. Using search here only takes me to the release notes.

Thanks for the help
Mouse over the kerbals portraits, and you will see a small circular button appear to the left of the leftmost portrait.  Mouse over it identifies it as the interior overlay button.  Click it.

Mod + IVA key

( ' alt + c '  for windows by default)

Edited May 6 by Errol
